infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera and image gallery to update profile images and upload documents/images.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the audio device to record short vides that can be uploaded to profiles for describing certain questions
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app uses the phone contacts to help user easily select a contact from contacts list
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the camera and image gallery to update profile images and upload documents/images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to authenticate that users are indeed in the location they claim to be
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryFileTimestam: The app uses the file timestamp to determine the time the file was last modified
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryUserDefaults: The app uses the user defaults to store user data for personalization
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategorySystemBootTi: The app may use the system boot time to determine the time the app was last used
infoPlist.NSPrivacyAccessedAPICategoryDiskSpace: The app uses the file system to store user data and images. Disk information may be required to show user how much space is available
